WaNoMeta.Description: This is a SimStack WaNo for the Eln-to-rdf converter.

WaNoBool.name: Graph plot
WaNoBool.description: Optionally have the plot of the graph as an output

WaNoTemplate.WaNoExecCommand: NANOVER=V4 CONFIG_PATH=$NANOMATCH/$NANOVER/configs/eln.config if [ -e $CONFIG_PATH ]; then echo "loading config from $CONFIG_PATH" source $CONFIG_PATH else echo "loading eln enviroment directly" simstack_server_mamba_source conda activate eln fi python eln2rdf.py i_eln.zip --keymap config.yml --output output.ttl \ {% if wano["Graph plot"] %} --plot {{ wano["Plot info"]["Plot path"] }} {% endif %}
